SEARCH
Package client

Class ChatClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.ChatClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ChatClient extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
Version:
August 2024
Author:
Kfir Amoyal, Noam Furman, Israel Ohayon, Eitan Zerbel, Yaniv Shatil, Omri Heit

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatClient

      public ChatClient(String host, int port, ChatIF clientUI) throws IOException
      Constructs an instance of the chat client.
      Parameters:
      host - The server to connect to.
      port - The port number to connect on.
      clientUI - The interface type variable.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleMessageFromClientUI

    • quit

      public void quit()
      This method terminates the client.

    • updateUserInMainPagesController

      public static void updateUserInMainPagesController(User user)
      This method updates the user in the MainPagesClientController. It ensures the update is performed on the JavaFX Application Thread.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to update.
